gptables - a highly opinionated package for spreadsheet production¶

gptables is a highly opinionated python package. It produces .xlsx files from your pandas dataframes or using reticulate in R. You define the mapping from your data to elements of the table. It does the rest.

gptables uses the official guidance on good practice spreadsheets. It advocates a strong adherence to the guidance by restricting the range of operations possible. The default theme gptheme should accomodate most use cases.

gptables is developed and maintained by the Best Practice and Impact division of the Office for National Statistics, UK.

Main Features¶

You define your mapping with your data as a GPTable.

You define the format of your mapping with a Theme, the default is gptheme.

You write_workbook() to win.
